name: tech-interview-guide
description: Premium Tech Interview Guide with 100+ Questions per Topic

scripts.build: echo 'Static site: no build required. Copying assets...' && mkdir -p dist && cp -r *.html assets markdowns dist/
scripts.docker-deploy: docker build -t tech-interview-guide . && docker run -d -p 8080:80 tech-interview-guide

author: Trae AI
